summary: Transatlantic flight 713 is in trouble because the pilot and crew are poisoned while flying above the ocean. Now the passengers have to take control to save their lives.
cast: Vladimir Chestnokov|Otar Koberidze|Lev Kruglyy|Lyudmila Abramova|Nikolai Korn|Yefim Kopelyan|Lyudmila Shagalova|Iosif Konopatsky|Zana Zanoni|Nonna Ten|Aleksandr Barushnoy|Oskar Lind|Rem Lebedev|Vladimir Vysotskiy|Eve Kivi|Aleksandr Mombeli|Vladimir Maryev|Yuri Dedovich|Yuriy Yenokyan|Arkadi Volgin|Irina Gubanova|Konstantin Khudyakov|Aleksandr Violinov|Sergei Golovanov|Nina Agapova|Arkadi Oberberg|Lilya Muradova|Alik Frantsev|Vladimir Kazarinov
title: 713 prosit posadku
